## RumInitConfiguration.startSessionReplayRecordingManually property

If the session is sampled for Session Replay, only start the recording when `startSessionReplayRecording()` is called, instead of at the beginning of the session. Default: if startSessionReplayRecording is 0, true; otherwise, false. See <a href="https://docs.datadoghq.com/real_user_monitoring/session_replay/browser/#usage" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Session Replay Usage</a> for further information.

**Signature:**

```typescript
startSessionReplayRecordingManually?: boolean | undefined;
```
